name: BLOCK-T231
configuration_schema:
$schema: http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#
title: BLOCK-T231 configuration
description: Configuration for BLOCK-T231.
type: object
properties:
  azimuth:
    description: Target Azimuth position
    type: number
    default: 0
  elevation:
    description: Target Elevation position
    type: number
    default: 80
  ignore:
    description: Name of the CSCs we want to ignore
    type: array
    default: []
  move_timeout:
    description: Timeout associated with the move_p2p scripts
    type: number
    default: 1800
